titleStmt.title: Stela from Tuol Lok Yeay (K. 1555), 847 śaka

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: The basic punctuation sign in this text is an ornate double daṇḍa written in one continuous movement, resembling an inverted S-shape. The name of the poet being made known in the text itself, it is possibile that the hand is that of the poet.

projectDesc.p: This project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.head: Face
div.p:
847 śaka daśamī roca Āśvajya nu mān· vraḥ śā-
sana dhūli vraḥ pāda dhūli jeṅ· vraḥ kaṁmrateṅ· Añ· ta
kaṁ(ste)[[ṅ·]] Añ· śri lakṣmipativarmma kaṁste[[ṅ·]] Añ· śri jayendrādhipa-
tivarmma kaṁste[[ṅ·]] Añ· śri jāyasiṅhavarmma kaṁste[[ṅ·]] Añ· śri mah(i/ī)dharava-
rmma nu mratāñ· śri rājendrasiṅha nu mratāñ· khloñ· śri (nr̥)patindravarmma
nu chloñ· gotrapāla khloñ· gāpa taṁ ten· pan(dval)· vraḥ śā-
sana ta vāp· heya p(r)atyaya kanmyaṅ· paṁre nu vāp· śiva-
vrāhmana pratyaya nu vāp· valadeva daśādhi-
kr̥tya raṅvāṅ· pi pre mok· saṅ(·) praśasta saṅ· (yama) Amru-
ṅ· pramāna prāsādapū(r)a nā(ṁ) cap· vraḥ puṣkara madhu vrah saṅvey·
vvaṁ jā pi s(va)tandra ta khloñ· vrihi ta khloñ· kandvāra pratyaya pa[ṁ]-
[re] syaṅ· vvaṁ jā pi Oy(·) vrihi ta paryyeṅ· cuṅ· caṅ· cralov· thve
vraḥ saṅveya gusa khloñ· vala phoṅ· sāmānya phoṅ· ta cuḥ
ta thleṅ· vvaṁ jā pi cvola qmaryyāda ta gi sruk· nā thve vraḥ saṅveya
ruva qnak ta Aṅgvoy· ta gi pramāna prāsādapūra vvaṁ jā pi qmaryyāda sye[[ṅ]] ti
Oya vraḥ saṅveya vvaṁ jā pi qnāk· cval· cāp· gmuṁ ta gi vrai I pramāna prāsāda
pūra Aṁvi vraḥ kaṁmrateṅ· Añ· yuj· thkval· treya thkva pu(dh)yāt thkval·
svāya sva kantai mat· chdiṅ· taṁvan· mat· chdiṅ· mat· (caṁlaṅ·)
[jai mai]ṅ· mat· chdiṅ· (m)at· caṁreṅ kaṁvaṅ· ka vraḥ (lha) thkval· laṅ· praloṅ·
mat· chdiṅ· pāk· valāy· mat· chli vraḥ n(u) vraḥ (li) lvac· thkvāl·
chli vrai (vraleṅ· trai) śrivrahmarakṣa mat· chdiṅ· vyāṅ· (roy·) ko(sumbha)
neḥ gi Aṁruṅ· pramāṇ nā thve cap· gmuṁ vraḥ saṅvey· vvaṁ jā pi qnak· cvol·
Amaryyāda (dah· mān·) qnāk ta cvol· Amaryyāda ta neḥ vrai ta roḥha neḥ-
ha nirṇaiyya pr̥sṭha tādana slik· mvāy(·) viṅ· dauv· kroy ni ke cvol(·) nuh·
(mān ta) cāp(·) gm[[u]]ṁ vraḥ puṣkara madhū cvah· cracyak· mvāy· toya hestaccheda
mvay· toya pādaccheda mvay· toya hetu vvaṁ praceya vraḥ śāsana

div.head: Face
div.p:
847 śaka nu mān· vraḥ śāsana dhūli
vraḥ pāda dhūli jeṅ· vraḥ kaṁmrateṅ· Añ·
ta kaṁsteṅ· Añ· śri lakṣmipativārmma kaṁste[[ṅ]] Añ·
śri jayendrādhipativarmma kaṁsteṅ· Añ· śri ja-
yasiṅ·ghavarmma kaṁsteṅ· Añ· śri mahidharavarmma
nu mratāñ· śri rājendrasiṅ·gha nu mratāñ·
śri jayendrapa(nd)ita pandvala vraḥ śāsana ta tel·
(O)ya pratyaya kanmya[[ṅ]] paṁre vāp· śivavrāhma-
na pratyaya nu vāp· va(la)deva daśādhikr̥-
tya raṅvāṅ·

First edited by Vong Sotheara (109-118) in roman and Khmer script; the variants of reading are taken from the Khmer script. Re-edited here by Dominique Soutif and Kunthea Chhom based on the estampage in Vong’s publication.
